definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: This will be good for the left.
sentences.chinese: 這種變化將對左派有利。

sentences.english: Are the left and right so religiously cleaved ?
sentences.chinese: 至於左派與右派，在宗教信仰上是否也壁壘分明？

sentences.english: Where left and right agree is that America feels adrift right now.
sentences.chinese: 左派和右派都認同的一點是美國現在處於迷茫期。

sentences.english: For both the left and right this means anti-intellectual.
sentences.chinese: 不管左派右派，這就代表反知識分子。

sentences.english: The left should be better able than the right to persuade the unions to accept change.
sentences.chinese: 左派會比優派更容易說服聯邦區接受改革。

sentences.english: Left-wing dissidents have been emasculated and marginalised.
sentences.chinese: 左派持不同政見者已經遭到削弱和排擠。

sentences.english: In much of the US, particularly the south and south west, Abe would be a left-winger.
sentences.chinese: 以美國特別是南方和西南部，安倍是左派。

sentences.english: Can the religious left become a force in American politics comparable to the right-wing version?
sentences.chinese: 宗教左派是否能成爲和右派相當的美國政治力量？

sentences.english: The leftist leader already had expelled the U.S. ambassador six months earlier.
sentences.chinese: 早在六個月前左派領導人已經把美國大使驅逐出境。

sentences.english: Some fell on deaf ears-wilfully deaf, in the case of the European left.
sentences.chinese: 有些人確故意裝聾作啞，比如歐洲的左派。

sentences.english: This is how gentlemen of the left act in politics.
sentences.chinese: 這就是左派紳士在政治中行動的方式。

sentences.english: First Rafael Correa, the leftist economist, won the presidency.
sentences.chinese: 首先拉斐爾科雷亞，左派經濟學家，贏得總統寶座。

sentences.english: "Impeachment of the president is clearly the end goal for the left, " Mr. Hannity added.
sentences.chinese: “彈劾總統顯然是左派的最終目標，”漢尼提還說。

sentences.english: China’s “leftists” are becoming more active as the global economy sputters.
sentences.chinese: 全球經濟危機以來，中國的左派人士更加活躍了起來。

sentences.english: The oddity is that almost everywhere the European left is in decline.
sentences.chinese: 稀奇的是，幾乎歐洲每個角落的左派勢力都在衰退。

sentences.english: Western leftists were enamored with its Marxist anti-Americanism.
sentences.chinese: 西方的左派被書中馬克思主義的反美論調所傾倒。

definition: the Narodniks, Russian populist group in the 19th century
